content: this cute crochet santa hat is sure to get you into the holiday spirit make this darling hat for yourself or for someone special this season easy to follow pattern with detailed instruction note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own hat > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog here 1 > the benefit of purchasing this pdf is > an easy to read printable and > ad-free version of the pattern the finished hat is approximately 20 around by 16 tall excluding pom pom materials needed worsted weight yarn crochet hook size i 9/5 50 mm pom pom maker if desired tapestry needle & scissors pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-santa-hat/
